titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a official duty defense to certain section 32 and related offenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

bill.summary: 6/21/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to make it a defense to a prosecution for destruction of aircraft or aircraft facilities and related offenses that the defendant was an officer or employee of, or of a non-foreign governmental entity within, the United States engaged in law enforcement activity authorized by law.
